description:
This course is not sponsored by or affiliated with Udemy, Inc.

There are many courses on Udemy and elsewhere that tell you how to make a Udemy course. This course teaches you how to apply what you know into your course.

Do you have something to offer from your work experience that can benefit others? Have you thought about making a Udemy course but are not sure on what?

There are aspects of your career that can developed in a great Udemy course. This course can show you how. It can also be a feature that gives new opportunities in your career.

Section One looks at how Preparing a course is much like a job search.

Section Two explains aspects of your course that are important in its creation

Section Three provides "Schools of Thought" that can impact your course content.

Section Four goes over what benefits a course can bring you in your career.

Whether you are a corporate employee, business owner, or other professional, you most likely have expertise that can benefit others. This course can show you how.
title: Use Your Career to Make a Popular Udemy Course - Unofficial
